descriptor.name: Punjab Disability Scholarship Application Advisor
descriptor.short_desc: Learn to guide students with disabilities in Punjab through the offline process of applying for the state-sponsored educational scholarship.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module explains the 'Scholarships to Students with Disabilities Scheme' offered by the Government of Punjab. Agents will learn the process to assist students with 40% or more disability in securing monthly financial aid for their education, from class 1st onwards.

  1. Scholarship Tiers & Benefits:
    Understand the two-tier benefit system: ₹200 per month for students in classes 1st to 8th, and ₹300 per month for students from the 9th class onwards. The scholarship is credited directly to the student's bank account.
  2. Eligibility Checklist:
    Master the key eligibility requirements, including having a disability certificate of 40% or more, family income below ₹5,000 per month, and securing at least 40% marks in the previous exam.
  3. Offline Application Workflow:
    Learn the complete offline application process, from obtaining the form, getting it verified by the Head of the school/institution, to its submission at the District Social Security Officer (DSSO) office.

Why Take This Course:

  • Enable students with disabilities to pursue education and become self-reliant.
  • Specialize in a key state-level social security scheme focused on education.
  • Become a vital point of contact for families seeking government support for their children's education.

descriptor.name: Punjab Social Security Facilitation Centre
descriptor.short_desc: Focused on enabling access to social security and welfare schemes in Punjab.
descriptor.long_desc: The Punjab Social Security Facilitation Centre is dedicated to raising awareness and simplifying the application process for state-sponsored schemes, ensuring benefits reach the deserving citizens.
